page.shortlink: UX Repeating Sections Scrollable container in-line style
page.description: Defines the in-line style of the scrollable container.
page.discussion: Specify the in-line style for the scrollable container.
page.note: While you can style elements in the UX Component using in-line styles, a better approach is to use CSS classes. Use the [Scrollable container class name] property to set the scrollable container's class.
This property is only available if [Scrollable container] is checked.
